mapper.update: UPDATE tb_protect_space AS s SET s.animal_insert_code =null ,s.use_state ='없음' WHERE s.protect_space_code=#{proSpaceCode};
mapper.select: SELECT s.protect_space_code ,s.animal_insert_code ,s.use_state ,s.implement_code ,s.protect_space_reg_date ,s.animal_protect_period FROM tb_protect_space AS s WHERE s.animal_insert_code=#{aniInsertCode};

SELECT s.protect_space_code ,s.animal_insert_code ,s.use_state ,s.implement_code ,s.protect_space_reg_date ,s.animal_protect_period FROM tb_protect_space AS s WHERE s.protect_space_code=#{proSpaceCode};

SELECT p.animal_protect_num as animalProtectNum ,p.animal_insert_code as animalInsertCode ,p.protect_space_code as protectSpaceCode ,p.protect_state as state ,p.animal_protect_reg_date as animalProtectRegDate ,p.animal_protect_exe_date as animalProtectExeDate FROM tb_animal_protect AS p WHERE p.animal_insert_code=#{animalNum};

SELECT protect_space_code as protectSpaceCode ,animal_insert_code as animalInsertCode ,use_state as useState ,implement_code as implementCode ,protect_space_reg_date as protectSpaceRegDate ,animal_protect_period as animalProtectPeriod FROM tb_protect_space ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTR(protect_space_code,14) as decimal) DESC;

SELECT member_id as memberId ,member_pw as memberPw ,level_code as level ,member_name as memberName ,member_phone as memberPhone ,member_addr as memberAddr ,member_email as memberEmail ,member_in_date as memberInDate FROM tb_member
